Test Name: SCALE (Specific IgE levels), IGE (Total Immunoglobulin E), SERUM (Serum proteins and biochemical markers)
Purpose: To generate accurate and reliable laboratory results for specific and total IgE levels and other serum biochemical markers.
Container: Serum collection tube (e.g., red-top or serum separator tube)
Equipment: ELISA plate reader, centrifuge, incubator, micropipettes with tips, vortex mixer
